title: Downloading LOL in increments
body:
Is it possible to pause the download of patches between sessions and pick up where it left off?
I got up to only 7k MB left but whenever I open the client up again, it starts downloading at 7k MB but then just says applying patches and jumps up to 16k MB.

replies.body: Not currently, trying to do so would cause the patcher to restart and scan all of your files for corruption before restarting the install process.  Constantly delaying might be breaking your files and end up not installing properly at all.  Your best bet is to let it do it's thing!
